summary: The diff shows HeroSection.tsx updated to reference the local asset path '/assets/generated/profile-photo.dim_400x400.png', and cv.ts updated so profilePhoto points to the same local path. However, the actual image file (profile-photo.dim_400x400.png) is not present in the diff as an added file under frontend/public/assets/generated/.

missing_requirements.requirement: The new LinkedIn photo must be saved as a local static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated/
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files. The image file 'profile-photo.dim_400x400.png' does not appear in the ADDED FILES section of the diff, meaning the actual binary asset was not committed or recorded as part of this change.
